name: build_stairs_seed42
description: The robot builds stairs from three blocks and then climbs them.

children.name: build_stairs
children.description: The robot pushes the small, medium, and large blocks into a configuration resembling stairs.

children.name: position_small_block
children.description: The robot positions the Small Block for robot interaction as the first step of the stairs. Goal state: Small Block is moved to its designated position for the stairs.

children.name: position_medium_block
children.description: The robot positions the Medium Block for robot interaction as the second step of the stairs. Goal state: Medium Block is moved to its designated position for the stairs.

children.name: position_large_block
children.description: The robot positions the Large Block for robot interaction as the third step of the stairs. Goal state: Large Block is moved to its designated position for the stairs.

children.name: climb_stairs
children.description: The robot jumps onto each block in sequence to ascend the built stairs.

children.name: ascend_first_step
children.description: The robot climbs onto the Small Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is standing stably on top of the Small Block.

children.name: ascend_second_step
children.description: The robot climbs onto the Medium Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is standing stably on top of the Medium Block.

children.name: ascend_third_step
children.description: The robot climbs onto the Large Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is standing stably on top of the Large Block.
